00001 package se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.popup.actions.validation;
00002 
00003 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.IPath;
00004 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor;
00005 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.IStatus;
00006 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.Status;
00007 import org.eclipse.core.runtime.jobs.Job;
00008 import org.eclipse.ui.statushandlers.StatusManager;
00009 
00010 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.Activator;
00011 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.management.ModelManager;
00012 import se.kth.md.simulinkExchange.management.exceptions.InvalidModelException;
00013 
00014 public abstract class TheJob extends Job {
00015 
00016         protected IPath inModelPath;
00017         protected Activator plugin;
00018         protected ModelManager modelManager;
00019 
00020         protected TheJob(String name, IPath aPath) {
00021                 super(name);
00022                 this.inModelPath = aPath;
00023                 plugin = Activator.getDefault();
00024         }
00025         
00026         @Override
00027         protected IStatus run(IProgressMonitor monitor) {
00028                 plugin.log("Validation job started.", Status.INFO);
00029                 int activitiesTotal = 2;
00030                 int scale = 100;
00031 
00032                 try {
00033                         monitor.beginTask("Validating", activitiesTotal*scale);
00034 
00035                         if (monitor.isCanceled()) return Status.CANCEL_STATUS;                  
00036                         monitor.subTask("Opening model");
00037                         modelManager.loadIt();
00038                         monitor.worked(1*scale);
00039                         plugin.log("Model opened.", Status.INFO);
00040                         
00041                         if (monitor.isCanceled()) return Status.CANCEL_STATUS;
00042                         monitor.subTask("checking the model");
00043                         modelManager.validateIt();
00044                         monitor.worked(1*scale);
00045                         plugin.log("Model validated.", Status.INFO);
00046                         
00047                 } catch (InvalidModelException e) {
00048                         // FIXME: InvalidObjects do not show nicely.
00049                         plugin.log("Invalid Model. Double click for details.", Status.ERROR, e);                        
00050                         Status status = new Status(IStatus.ERROR, Activator.PLUGIN_ID, "Invalid model. See Error log for details."); 
00051                         StatusManager.getManager().handle(status, StatusManager.SHOW);
00052                         e.printStackTrace();
00053                         
00054                 } finally {
00055                         monitor.done();
00056                 }
00057                 
00058                 return Status.OK_STATUS;
00059         }
00060 
00061 }
